content: in 2022 a notary named xx is representing a private limited company called n in a divorce case between mr man and mrs vrouw the couple has agreed on the division of their property custody arrangements for their children and the distribution of their assets and debts they have also assigned their immovable property to mr man and agreed on financial contributions for their childrens maintenance the agreement is subject to court approval and can be modified in the future the parties have chosen the court and discussed wage authorization for maintenance payments they have also been informed about the maintenance claims service the divorce has been finalized and recorded by the registrar the notary has confirmed the parties identities and explained their obligations the cost for the notarys services is mentioned as one hundred euros the necessary documentation has been completed and a draft of the legal document was sent to the parties involved the document was partially read and signed by the partners
